name: MEMessageAction
desc: An action the system performs on a message, such as setting a color or archiving it.

items.name: class var markAsRead: MEMessageAction
items.desc: An object that marks the message as read.

items.name: class var markAsUnread: MEMessageAction
items.desc: An object that marks the message as unread.

items.name: class var moveToArchive: MEMessageAction
items.desc: An object that moves the message to the account’s Archive mailbox.

items.name: class var moveToJunk: MEMessageAction
items.desc: An object that moves the message to the account’s Junk mailbox.

items.name: class var moveToTrash: MEMessageAction
items.desc: An object that moves the message to the account’s Trash mailbox.

items.name: enum MEMessageAction.MessageColor
items.desc: A color that the system uses to display a message in the message list.
